report.title: Existing groups for site
report.description: Lists groups already defined for this site.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN location_attribute_values v ON v.location_id=l.id AND v.location_attribute_id=272 WHERE l.parent_id=#parent_id# #order_by#

param.name: parent_id
param.description: ID of the parent site to filter to
